poems.title: Why I Love You
poems.author: Neal Andrew Peteros
poems.poem:
In this world of uncertainty and doubt
When there seems no safe place and I freak out

You never fail to call me out
To silence my fears, my anxiety, and my doubt

In this world where creeps and monsters roam about,
In this world of demons and devils breaking out
In this world where darkness rise and the light is blot out
You bring forth a world of peace, harmony, and safe hideout

A world of serenity and tranquility
Curing a heart filled with trauma and instability
A heart you did not destroy
But a heart you cured for this young boy

Such is the reason I found love in you
